name: Trust Fall (Stove_Top)
description:
TRUST FALL

You have fallen into a dark world of despair. Enemies chase you as you fall deeper and deeper. There is danger around every corner. The only people who will help are the monsters who live here. Whether or not they will be useful will be a roll of the dice...

Theme

This game is being made for the 2022 GMTK game jam. The theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Trust Fall uses the theme of "Roll of the Dice" by having he player choose between different weapons and stats at the start of each level, without knowing if those stats will really be good for them or not. The act of choosing, thus, is a "Roll of the Dice".

Controls

Move with A & D. Look Up/Down with W & S. Shoot with left mouse button. Space to jump.
